thread.section_title: Citadines Bastille Marais Paris - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Excellent apartment.
thread.title_full: Excellent apartment. - Review of Citadines Bastille Marais Paris, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Monika M
title: Excellent apartment.
text: We stayed at this hotel which has an excellent location and value for money. The staff was friendly. This hotel was just walking distance from the metro station of Bastile. The kitchen of the apartment had all utensils one would require. The hotel also serves simple breakfast. The location was nice with some lovely restaurants around. We had the luxury of finding some Indian / Pakistani restaurants nearby Bastile too. We were extremely happy travelling the metro too and reaching Champ Elyesses the most happening place of Paris at all times
